name: map-printing-backend
description: Backend server for Shopify Custom Map Printing Platform

scripts.tunnel:capture: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run tunnel" "wait-on http://localhost:4040 && npm run capture-ngrok"
scripts.dev:complete: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run tunnel" "wait-on http://localhost:4040 && npm run capture-ngrok && npm run dev"
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:config && npm run test:unit && npm run test:tokens && npm run test:csrf && npm run test:error-handling && npm run test:token-refresh
scripts.test:mapbox: node tests/mapbox-integration-test.js && node tests/dpi-export-validation.js && node tests/webgl-support-test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ci && npm run test:mapbox && npm run test:security && npm run test:error-handling && npm test

author: Print My Ride
